trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Fountain Hills
There were no other sightings in Fountain Hills on or around July 10th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsA very bright (star) blinked out for about 30sec then came back on then minutes later I thought I seen a helicopter or sati light move into position better to observe it, but I may be wrong because the helicopter or sati light stayed in position for at least three hours.
Summary: What I thought was a star blinked off for about 30sec then came back on.
